prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a fish and has bright orange and white colors.
Imagine a playful aquatic creature with a floppy body and vibrant patterns swimming in the ocean.
Design a small, weak Pokemon that evolves into a powerful fish with an epic transformation.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies a lazy but lovable personality, with a distinctive fin structure.
Show me a basic water-type Pokemon that has a unique color pattern and a cheerful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its clumsy behavior and bright, eye-catching colors.
Give me a whimsical fish Pokemon that thrives in both urban and natural water environments.
